description: Decimal expansion of square root of 79.
comments: Continued fraction expansion is 8 followed by {1, 7, 1, 16} repeated. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 09 2009
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=sqrt(79); for (n=1, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b010531.txt", n, " ", d)); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 09 2009
crossrefs: Cf. A010157 Continued fraction. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 09 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
